edu.biu.scapi.securityLevel

Interface StandAlone

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ProtocolSecLevel, SecurityLevel
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    UC
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CTBlumPartyOne, CTBlumPartyTwo, CTStringPartyOne, CTStringPartyTwo, OTFullSimDDHOnByteArrayReceiver, OTFullSimDDHOnByteArraySender, OTFullSimDDHOnGroupElementReceiver, OTFullSimDDHOnGroupElementSender, OTFullSimROMDDHOnByteArrayReceiver, OTFullSimROMDDHOnByteArraySender, OTFullSimROMDDHOnGroupElementReceiver, OTFullSimROMDDHOnGroupElementSender, OTUCDDHOnByteArrayReceiver, OTUCDDHOnByteArraySender, OTUCDDHOnGroupElementReceiver, OTUCDDHOnGroupElementSender

    public interface StandAlone
extends ProtocolSecLevel
    Any protocol that is proven secure in the stand-alone model (where secure protocols are run sequentially and not concurrently) should implement this interface.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Yael Ejgenberg)
